text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <DESCRIPTION>7. Bey Hrn. Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind folgende Bücher zu verkauffen:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Frischens Harpfen Davids</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 2. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stähelins</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>48. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Sammlung auserlesener Cantzel-Reden</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>Erster Theil</VOLUME>, 
    <PRIZE>56. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Satyrische Gedichte</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Brieffe</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>9. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Tempe Helvetica</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 6.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Alardins</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Geistlicher Thee-Brauch</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>4. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nachricht von Joh. Bossarten</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>heilige Reden</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>1ter Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fischers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anmerckungen</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>6. Stuck complet</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Brachmann</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>complet</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>alle in albo. Ferner, gebunden:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fabri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>9. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Scriptores-Helv.</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>3. Pfund 10. ß.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Simlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Regiment der Eydgnoschafft</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>1. Pfund 17. ß.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Valer. Mar- Amst.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>18. ß.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nov. Testam. Graec.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Homeri Ilias & Odys.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>12. 2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Judas der Ertzschelm</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>4. Pf.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":16,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration for well-formedness. 2. Replaced corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u00bacher to 'Bücher', \u221a\u2264 to 'to', ß for scharfes S). 3. Fixed malformed tags (e.g., <PRICE> to <PRIZE>). 4. Structured the <BIBL> elements consistently with proper nesting. 5. Added <DESCRIPTION> tags for introductory text segments. 6. Corrected 'fl.' and 'xr.' abbreviations for consistency. 7. Fixed 'Homen' to 'Homeri' in the title. 8. Ensured all tags are properly closed."}

    <AUTHOR>Simlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Regiment der Eydgnoschafft</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Valer. Mar- Amst.</TITLE>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nov. Testam. Graec.</TITLE>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Homeri Ilias & Odys.</TITLE>

parsed.explanation: 1. Added XML declaration for well-formedness. 2. Replaced corrupted Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u00bacher to 'Bücher', \u221a\u2264 to 'to', ß for scharfes S). 3. Fixed malformed tags (e.g., <PRICE> to <PRIZE>). 4. Structured the <BIBL> elements consistently with proper nesting. 5. Added <DESCRIPTION> tags for introductory text segments. 6. Corrected 'fl.' and 'xr.' abbreviations for consistency. 7. Fixed 'Homen' to 'Homeri' in the title. 8. Ensured all tags are properly closed.
